output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes, contains "CMF 11240017" 2. Refers to candidate: The post indirectly refers to PSD's presidential campaign by mentioning "câștigăm primul tur al alegerilor prezidențiale" 3. Addresses wide population: Yes, it's a paid advertisement reaching 4000-4999 impressions 4. Electoral objective: Yes, clearly states winning the presidential elections and promotes PSD measures 5. Journalism: No, this is clearly campaign material 6. Personal opinion: No, this is structured campaign communication
The post contains several elements that make it electoral propaganda: - Direct reference to winning presidential elections - Promotion of PSD government measures - Official CMF number - Paid distribution - Campaign hashtag #caleasigurapentruromania - Clear electoral messaging about presidential elections
This is particularly problematic because: 1. It's running after the end of the presidential campaign period 2. It explicitly promotes electoral success in presidential elections 3. It's a paid advertisement with significant reach

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This constitutes electoral propaganda because: - Contains official campaign identifier (CMF) - Explicitly discusses presidential election victory - Promotes party achievements and future promises - Is a paid advertisement reaching thousands - Uses official campaign messaging and hashtags
conclusion.message-for-police: Infomed Pro SRL, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin difuzarea de materiale de propaganda electorala pentru alegerile prezidentiale dupa incheierea perioadei legale de campanie. Postarea cu ID-ul 595398042978959 promoveaza explicit victoria in alegerile prezidentiale ("câștigăm primul tur al alegerilor prezidențiale"), contine numar CMF (11240017), si promoveaza masurile PSD in contextul alegerilor prezidentiale. Postarea este sponsorizata si activa dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, atingand intre 4000-4999 de persoane. Materialul reprezinta propaganda electorala conform Art. 36(7) din Legea 334/2006, indeplinind toate conditiile: referire directa la partid, obiectiv electoral explicit, adresare catre public larg prin sponsorizare, si depaseste limitele activitatii jurnalistice.
